QuestData.Title: Breaking Down the Big Guns
QuestData.Description: You did well against that sea witch, but not well enough.$B$BHer power far surpasses any creature that I have ever fought. To defeat her, we will need something formidable. Something that she will not expect...$B$B<Toryl grins wryly.>$B$BSomething of their own design... $B$BSalvage as many parts from their harpoon launchers as you can carry and meet me back in Jandvik.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect 50 Harpoon Parts from Sashj'tar Harpooners in Azuregale Bay.
QuestData.CompletionText: The Tidemistress is a dangerous foe. We must be just as cunning to defeat her.
QuestData.RewardText: You have all the parts that you will need... two in some cases.
